attributes.action: Remind the government of article 50 withdrawal act was passed into law
attributes.additional_details: The majority of the people of the  united kingdom voted for brexit democratically and we wish the government to honour article 50 brought into law under Teresa May and not return us to the EU in any shape or form
attributes.background: Honour article 50 the withdrawal of the uk which was passed into law by the British population

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government have not announced any plans to re-join the EU.
